provider

Class NetworkProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • provider.NetworkProvider

  • public class NetworkProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Core class of network module. It stores references to every created threads and provide interface to interact with the module.
    Author:
    Antoine

    • Method Detail

      • getNetwork

        public NetworkImpl getNetwork()
        Simple getter for network implementation.
        Returns:
        Current instance of the network implementation

      • createServer

        public Server createServer()
        Create the server/listener thread and return the instance. If a server thread is already running, does not create a new instance but return the running one.
        Returns:
        current instance of the server thread

      • getDataImpl

        public DataForNet getDataImpl()
        Simple getter for data interface implementation.
        Returns:
        current instance of the implemetation of data interface

      • setDataImpl

        public void setDataImpl(DataForNet dataInterface)
        Allows users to set the instance bind to the DataInterface interface.
        Parameters:
        dataInterface - implementation of DataInterface

      • createMessageProcess

        public MessageProcess createMessageProcess(Message m,
                                           java.net.Socket s)
        Create a new thread to process a given message. It adds the thread to the list of the running threads and return the instance.
        Parameters:
        m - message to process
        s - socket through which the message has been received
        Returns:
        created instance of the new thread

      • createSendToUserThread

        public SendToUserThread createSendToUserThread(java.io.Serializable p,
                                               java.net.InetAddress ip)
        Create a new dedicated thread to send a message to a given user, and returns the instance of the newly created thread.
        Parameters:
        p - payload to be sent in the message
        ip - ip address of the receiver
        Returns:
        instance of the newly created thread

      • createRequestDownloadThread

        public RequestDownloadThread createRequestDownloadThread(java.util.stream.Stream<java.net.InetAddress> ownersIps,
                                                         java.lang.String musicHash)
        Create a new dedicated thread to send a download request to a given set of users, and returns the instance of the newly created thread.
        Parameters:
        ownersIps - ips where the music can be downloaded
        musicHash - hash of the desired music
        Returns:
        instance of the newly created thread

      • getThreads

        public java.util.Collection<ThreadExtend> getThreads()
        Simple getter for threads.
        Returns:
        collection of the current running threads
